members.signatureBeforeChange: int gtk_test_expand_row (int tree, int iter, int path)
members.signatureAfterChange: int gtk_test_expand_row (int tree, int iter, int path)
diff: +	* Bug in GTK.  Expanding the target row during the test_expand_row
+	* handler will cause a segmentation fault if the animation code is allowed
+	* to run.  The fix is to block the animation if the row is already

members.signatureBeforeChange: int gtk_test_collapse_row (int tree, int iter, int path)
members.signatureAfterChange: int gtk_test_collapse_row (int tree, int iter, int path)
diff: +	* Bug in GTK.  Collapsing the target row during the test_collapse_row
+	* handler will cause a segmentation fault if the animation code is allowed
+	* to run.  The fix is to block the animation if the row is already
